review: I love this.  I watch many things on my Kindle and it is nice to be able to watch them on the larger tv screen when desired.  Also able to browse Amazon Prime free shows even without my Kindle.Found that for my Kindle HD I can only watch Amazon videos on the tv.  For my wife's HDX she can mirror her screen and show any App up on the larger tv screen.  Very nice.
